News.Title: Usha Martin Education Solutions Reports Quarterly Financial Results
News.Summary: Usha Martin Education Solutions Limited announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. The company reported revenue from operations of Rs 7.32 lakh for the quarter, with total income of Rs 22.28 lakh. Net profit for the quarter stood at Rs 8.67 lakh, while half-year net profit was Rs 2.97 lakh. The company's earnings per share for the quarter was Rs 0.03. Total assets increased to Rs 1,634.61 lakh from Rs 1,627.50 lakh as of March 31, 2025. The results include both standalone and consolidated financials, with the consolidated results incorporating subsidiary Usha Martin Education Private Limited. The Board of Directors approved these results at their meeting held on November 11, 2025.

News.Title: Usha Martin Education & Solutions Approves Q1 FY2026 Financial Results
News.Summary: Usha Martin Education & Solutions Limited's Board of Directors approved the unaudited financial results for the first quarter ended June 30, 2025, during a board meeting held on August 12, 2025. The company submitted both standalone and consolidated financial results along with a Limited Review Report to the National Stock Exchange and Bombay Stock Exchange. The board meeting ran from 10:30 AM to 1:00 PM, with the results being prepared in accordance with SEBI listing regulations.
